attributes.action: stop Great Britain's partciation in the 2008 Bejing Olympic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should we support a goverment that has very seious human rights issue and then when proposals against another totatalitarian dictator are tried to be instigated the worst offenders on the planet (also the countries who supply the arms) are vindicated.
How can we offer military support to a French speaking colony such as Nigeria and completley ignore one of our own (ex) Commonwealth countries such as Zimbabwe?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
